text: geulihayeo geunyeoga yeoaleul nah-ass-euni, geunyeoga malhagil “jeoui junim! sillo jeoneun yeojaleul nah-assseubnida.” geunyeoga mueos-eul nah-assneunjineun hananimkkeseo gajang jal asinola. “namjaneun yeojawa gatji anhseubnida. sillo jeoneun geunyeoleul maleuyam(malia)eulo ileumjieossgo sillo jeoneun geunyeowa geunyeoui huson-i jeojubad-eun satan-eulobuteo bohodoegil dangsinkke yocheongdeulibnida.”
